CreateEmployeeResource.title: Create Employees Resource

status.description: Indicates if the request was successful or not

message.description: Message indicating the status of the response

employee.description: Employee information, which is null in this case

CreatePaymentResource.title: Create Payment Resource
CreatePaymentResource.description: Resource returned when a payment is created

status.description: Indicates if the operation was successful

message.description: A message describing the result of the operation

value_in_reais.description: Value of the payment in Brazilian reais

dateTime.description: Date and time when the payment was registered

paid.description: Indicates if the payment has been made

vehicle_id.description: ID of the vehicle associated with the payment

status.description: Indicates if the operation was successful
